name: sentinel
description: Redis Sentinel management commands for Redis Shell.

commands.name: deploy
commands.description: Deploy a new Redis Sentinel setup with master and replicas.

commands.name: info
commands.description: Get information about the Sentinel setup.

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Remove the Sentinel setup and clean up.

commands.name: stop
commands.description: Stop the Sentinel setup without cleaning up data.

commands.name: start
commands.description: Start the Sentinel setup without losing data.

author: Redis Shell Team
